data.sentence: The word عَنِ comes from the root ع ن and is associated with the meanings:
The word السَّمْعِ comes from the root س م ع and is associated with the meanings: to hear, hearken, listen.

data.meanings: to set aside, remove from. ma'zilun - a place separate from the rest, secluded spot, place of retirement, far away. ma'zulun - removed. i'tizal (vb. 8) to separate or remove one self from.. . 'Azalta (prt. 2nd. m. sing.): Thou put aside (in the matter) provisionally.. I'tazala (prf. 3rd. m. sing. VIII): He withdrew, kept away.. I'tazalaa (prf. 3rd. m. plu.): They kept away, left you alone.. I'tazaltumuu (prf.2nd p. m. plu. juss.): You have left (them).. Ya'taziluu (imp. 3rd. m. plu. final Nun dropped): They withdraw, leave (you) alone.. A'tazilu (imp. 1st. sing. VIII): I shall withdraw, shall keep away.. I'taziluu (prt. n. plu.): You keep away.. I'taziluuni (comp. I'tazilu + nii prt. m. plu.): Keep away from me.. Ma'zuuluuna (pct. pic. n. plu.): Removed ones; Precluded ones.. Ma`zilun (n. of place): Place where one is set aloof.
data.sentence: The word لَمَعْزُولُونَ comes from the root ع ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to set aside, remove from. ma'zilun - a place separate from the rest, secluded spot, place of retirement, far away. ma'zulun - removed. i'tizal (vb. 8) to separate or remove one self from.. . 'Azalta (prt. 2nd. m. sing.): Thou put aside (in the matter) provisionally.. I'tazala (prf. 3rd. m. sing. VIII): He withdrew, kept away.. I'tazalaa (prf. 3rd. m. plu.): They kept away, left you alone.. I'tazaltumuu (prf.2nd p. m. plu. juss.): You have left (them).. Ya'taziluu (imp. 3rd. m. plu. final Nun dropped): They withdraw, leave (you) alone.. A'tazilu (imp. 1st. sing. VIII): I shall withdraw, shall keep away.. I'taziluu (prt. n. plu.): You keep away.. I'taziluuni (comp. I'tazilu + nii prt. m. plu.): Keep away from me.. Ma'zuuluuna (pct. pic. n. plu.): Removed ones; Precluded ones.. Ma`zilun (n. of place): Place where one is set aloof.
